title: Chris Hayes: GOP is becoming a pro-virus party before our eyes

title: Steve Schmidt on Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley: ‘Small and silly men at a serious hour’

author: NBCNews.com
title: Schiff: Trump commuting Stone's sentence is 'so destructive' to the rule of law
description: Rep. Adam Schiff, D-Calif., says that President Trump's commutation of Roger Stone is "so destructive" of the Department of Justice and the rule of law. He also claimed that this action shows if you lie for the president, "he will protect you."

title: Administration official says Justice Department had no involvement with Stone clemency decision
